name: Heart of the Woods
description: A fantasy yuri visual novel filled with magic, fairies, and a ghost girl. When Maddie and her best friend, Tara, journey to a remote forest village to investigate rumors of the supernatural, they find a whole lot more than they bargained for.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Processor Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
